context_bundle.summary: Node.js performance optimization covering V8 engine optimization, memory leak detection, profiling with Chrome DevTools, and performance best practices

onboarding.quick_start: node --inspect app.js && open chrome://inspect && node --prof app.js && node --prof-process isolate-*.log
common_patterns: Chrome DevTools profiling: 'node --inspect-brk app.js' and open chrome://inspect for CPU/memory profiling
Heap snapshot: 'node --inspect app.js' then take heap snapshot in DevTools Memory tab
V8 optimization: 'function monomorphic(obj) { return obj.x; }' - keep object shapes consistent
Avoid delete: 'obj.prop = undefined' instead of 'delete obj.prop' to maintain hidden class
Worker threads: 'const { Worker } = require("worker_threads"); const worker = new Worker("./cpu-intensive.js");' for CPU-bound tasks
Cluster mode: 'const cluster = require("cluster"); if (cluster.isMaster) { for (let i = 0; i < cpus; i++) cluster.fork(); }'
Object pooling: 'const pool = []; function getObject() { return pool.pop() || createNew(); } function releaseObject(obj) { pool.push(obj); }'
known_errors: Memory leak: Use 'node --inspect' and heap snapshots to find retained objects, check for global variables and event listeners
High CPU usage: Profile with 'node --prof', check for blocking operations, use worker threads for CPU-intensive tasks
Event loop blocked: Use 'setImmediate()' to break up long operations, avoid synchronous I/O
GC pauses: Reduce object allocation, use object pooling, tune GC with '--max-old-space-size=4096'
Slow startup: Use 'node --prof' to profile startup, lazy-load modules, use dynamic imports
Memory fragmentation: Restart process periodically, use '--max-old-space-size' to limit heap
